name: Kitten Hero
description:
In Kitten Hero, you'll play as a kitten (very cute by the way), who will do anything to rescue his human from a spaceship controled by an alien artificial intelligence.

A high difficulty precision platform game.

Enter the alien spaceship and overcome all the challenges created by the A.I. that controls the environment.


History:
It all starts on a quiet day, when the kitten and its owner were walking in the woods near their house. And then the ground starts to shake, making it difficult to stand.

And with great fear, the kitten jumps into the lap of its owner, who was already kneeling on the floor. When it appears between the clouds, something in which the two did not understand.

A strong light hovers over their heads and suddenly, they begin to float towards the strange object.

When the kitten regains consciousness, he finds himself in a completely different place. Frightened, he calls for his owner, however, who or what answers his call is not human.
